channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
channel.desc: David Dickinson is in Oldham with dealers Jan Keyne, Tracy Thackray-Howitt, James Layte and Simon Schneider.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Seeking success are brothers from Blackburn Hussain and Imran, mother and daughter duo Claire and Mia from Surrey and childhood sweethearts Esther and Adam from Birmingham.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Deal or No Deal
channel.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern as Paula, who is supported by her daughter, takes on the Banker and tries to take home a fortune.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Annie from Kingswinford, Ryan from Manchester, Sharon from Croydon and Phil from Derby hope that they can beat a Chaser together and leave with thousands of pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Things get heated, Dylan steals from Ray, and Ruby and Caleb are stunned.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Carabao Cup
channel.desc: Mark Pougatch presents 2025-26 EFL Carabao Cup Fourth Round coverage as Championship side Wrexham play host to League One Cardiff City in an all-Welsh tie at the Racecourse Ground.
